entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16 except minus 20 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 except minus 20 inland. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
